metadata.title: CVE-2017-2904 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable integer overflow exists in the RADIANCE loadingfunctionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. Aspecially crafted '.hdr' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in abuffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of theapplication. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an assetvia the sequencer in order to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2904` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

blender - 2.79+dfsg0-1
blender-data - 2.79+dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: blender package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.79+dfsg0-1').
